name: The Last Will
description:
"The Last Will" is a short yet intense adventure game about a grieving father who finds out his estranged son has left him a very special Will. His quest is to fulfill it with an assistant, despite his prejudices.

Presented for the first time in 1080p, "The Last Will" is a 3D point-and-click, drama-slice of life adventure game played from the perspective of a grieving father whose son just passed away. "The Last Will" intertwines a sad (and uplifting) narrative with puzzle-solving gameplay. Find hidden items to complete achievements and solve casual puzzles to make the story go forward.

Featuring an emotional soundtrack, "The Last Will" is an intense adventure game drama about the bonds between a father and his son.
